t:
The court declared him innocent.



But the crowd outside declared him guilty.
c:
This also works the other way. The number of innocent people in jail due to the fucked up judiciary system are proofs.



#court #innocence #declaration #crowd #guilt #wrong #crime #mistake





Casey Marie Anthony was convicted of murdering her daughter Caylee Marie Anthony. Caylee's birthday was 3 days back, on 9th August.
